description: A train carrying hazardous chemcials derails 12 miles south of Silver City, Utah. Unknown amounts of various chemicals leaking from overturned railcars: phosphoric acid, sodium bicarbonate, diesel fuel, propane and 53% phosphoric anhydride. It is determined that destroying the railcars is the most expedient method for clearing the tracks. Using modeling data gathered from various sources, the State Fire Marshal safely destroys the derailed train cars.
name: Train Derailment with Hazardous Chemicals
